subheading: by mark frauenfelder "the journey begins," reads the t-shirt given to every new apple computer employee – a reference to steve jobs’s koan "the journey is the reward." at apple that journey involved hundreds of t-shirts, which gordon thygeson catalogs in apple t-shirts: a yearbook of history at apple computer. according to thygeson, employees and […]
